column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kate - Thanks for the great review! We're very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us
column2: and even happier you tried ramen for the first time. When we thought to bring to Houston a restaurant dedicated almost entirely to authentic Japanese ramen
column3: we weren't entirely sure how it would play. So it's always an encouraging to read reviews from folks who try us out and enjoy it -- thanks again!
